Summary: spotted weird object in the sky and onced noticed it left.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the car with my dad driving home from manteca which is the next city away, and on the ride home i noticed a dull grey object in the top right area of the windshield,(windshield was clean, i know that what we were looking at was not a smudge or anything) and i dismissed it as nothing but then my dad said what is that and pointed at it. so we were still driving and looking at it trying to figure out what it was and then about a minuet later after just looking at it, it dissapeared. like it sped off and was gone, and nothing that i know of can move that fast. once it left we were very puzzled.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Ripon
There were no other sightings in Ripon on or around September 29th 2009
